REGULAR.description:
Umibozu drops in to visit Kagura, but he and Gintoki get the shock of their lives when Kagura reveals she has a boyfriend now.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les marches vers l’âge adulte ne vont pas forcément vers le haut
Otona no Kaidan wa Nobori Kaidan to wa Kagiranai
The Stairs to Adulthood May Not Always Lead Up
大人の階段は昇り階段とは限らない

REGULAR.description:
Umibozu and Gintoki`s meeting with Kagura`s boyfriend Dai doesn`t go according to plan as he`s revealed to be the prince of Planet Titan. Meanwhile, the new couple`s relationship takes a drastic turn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hageta Otousan to Shiraga no Otousan to Otousan no Megane
Le papa chauve, le papa aux cheveux blancs et les lunettes de papa
My Bald Dad, My Light-Haired Dad, and My Dad`s Glasses
ハゲたお父さんと白髪のお父さんとお父さんのメガネ

REGULAR.description:
Katsura, upon hearing Ikumatsu`s story about an old man who used to visit her restaurant every New Year`s Eve, enlists the Odd Jobs` help to look for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bowl of Ramen
Ippai no Ramen
Un bol de ramen
一杯のラーメン

REGULAR.description:
The gang discover the truth behind the old man and look to reunite him with Ikumatsu and her ramen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Family
Hitotsu no Kazoku
Une famille
一つのかぞく

REGULAR.description:
Hasegawa has a life-or-death encounter with assassins, and the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi compete over solving a fictional case.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les lunettes de soleil de la vie et de la mort / Toutes les réponses sont sur le terrain
Life, Death, and Shades / All the Answers Can Be Found in the Field
Sei to Shi no Glasun / Subete no Kotae wa Genba ni Aru
生と死のグラサン / 全ての答えは現場にある

REGULAR.description:
The Odd Jobs encounter a strange sword at Tetsuko`s smithy, and it grows attached (quite literally) to Gintoki`s behind!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3 000 lieues à la recherche d`un fourreau
3000 Leagues in Search of a Scabbard
Saya o Tazunete Sanzenri
鞘をたずねて三千里

REGULAR.description:
Kusanagi reveals the details of an old wound he received at the hands of the cursed sword, Maganagi, as Gintoki and Okita get ready for their duel. Meanwhile, Hijikata investigates Senbe the Manslayer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do S to Do S
Sadique VS sadique
The Super Sadist and the Super Sadist
ドSとドS

REGULAR.description:
The Excaliburling story reaches its climax as Maganagi takes over Okita`s body and reveals the truth to Kusanagi. How will Gintoki respond?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`épée la plus puissante et le sabre émoussé
Saikyou no Ken to Saitei no Don
The Strongest Sword, and the Dullest Sword
最強の剣と最低の鈍

REGULAR.description:
As group units take over the idol industry, Terakado Tsu must adapt or fall behind the times. But the idol she forms a combo unit with is... Kagura?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akushu no Mae wa Te o Arae
Lave-toi les mains avant une poignée de main
Wash Your Hands Before a Handshake
握手の前は手を洗え

REGULAR.description:
Boogie Diamonds 48 has to deal with the sudden arrival of Galaxy Kingdom Bitches 48, who challenge them for the spot of Edo`s top idol!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Diamond wa Kizutsukanai
Diamonds Are Unscratchable
Le diamant ne se brise pas
ダイヤモンドは傷つかない

REGULAR.description:
The battle at the Oedo Dome heats up as the fans waver between the two groups, but Otsu is still holed up indoors. Will she fade away, or will Shinpachi and gang rekindle her passion?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Idol`s Badge of Honor
Idol no Kunshou
La médaille d`une starlette
アイドルの勲章

REGULAR.description:
In the first half, Gintoki decides that as protagonist, he can`t sit and do nothing as a Gintama game is released. He takes matters into his own hands as Odd Jobs looks to produce a superhit. In the second, Shinpachi buys a new pair of glasses that get him rather high spirits...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami Gee to Kuso Gee wa Kamihitoe / Megane wa Tamashii no Ichibu
Les jeux légendaires et les jeux merdiques diffèrent à peine
The Line Between Godlike Games and Shitty Games Is Paper-Thin / Glasses Are a Part of the Soul
神ゲーと糞ゲーは紙一重 / メガネは魂の一部

REGULAR.description:
The Kabuki District Sports Meet begins, and Shinpachi bears witness to the influence guardian spirits have on such events. Will he be able to fight through it and help Odd Jobs win the cash prize?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guardian Spirits Are Also a Part of the Soul
Les esprits gardiens font aussi partie de l`âme
Shugorei mo Tamashii no Ichibu
守護霊も魂の一部

REGULAR.description:
Utsuro`s master plan is in full effect as Earth is taken over by the Altana Liberation Army. With Odd Jobs still not back from Rakuyo, the residents of Kabuki District have a hard time adjusting to life as a colony.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tennen Perm wa Gunyagunya Magatte mo Modotte Kuru
Try As You Might to Make a Natural Perm Go Away, It Will Always Return
Une permanente a beau être tortillée, elle revient toujours
天然パーマはグニャグニャ曲がっても戻ってくる

REGULAR.description:
Katsura, Sakamoto, and Nobunobu arrive at the S.S. Heavenly Bird and try to bring the Liberation Army to the negotiating table. Meanwhile, the various factions in Edo begin to make their move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choumiryou wa Hikaeme ni
Flavoring Is Best in Small Quantities
L`assaisonnement s`use avec modération
調味料は控え目に

REGULAR.description:
With the Odd Jobs looking for the Tendoshu, things heat up on the Liberation Army`s main ship. Shijaku has promised his cooperation to Nobunobu, but now he must convince his comrades.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Delinquent`s Kid Has Long Neck Hair
Les enfants de délinquants ont de longs cheveux couvrant leur nuque
Yankee no Kodomo wa Eriashi ga Nagai
ヤンキーの子供は襟足が長い

REGULAR.description:
The encounter with Utsuro leaves Gintoki feeling more helpless than ever before. That`s when he receives a very powerful reminder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La différence entre tenace et lourd ne tient qu`à un fil
Shibutoi to Shitsukoi wa Kamihitoe
The Line Between Tenacious and Annoying Is Paper-Thin
しぶといとしつこいは紙一重

REGULAR.description:
The return of some familiar faces breathes new life into Earth`s resistance, but they`re as troublesome as they`ve always been! And when the Liberation Army brings out its big guns, it`s up to Gengai to respond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geezers Carve the Things They Shouldn`t Forget into Their Wrinkles
Jiisan wa Wasurete wa Ikenai Mono o Shiwa ni Kizamu
Le papy plisse de rides ce qu`il ne doit pas oublier
爺さんは忘れてはいけないものを皺に刻む

REGULAR.description:
The machines have done their part and left Earth`s future in the hands of humanity. But Gengai`s cannon has also painted a huge target on the Kabuki Distruct, and the Liberation Army immediately marches toward it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Machines That Pick Up Useless Habits Are Called People
Muda o Oboeta Kikai o Ningen to Iu
Un humain est une machine ayant appris des choses inutiles
無駄を覚えた機械を人間という

REGULAR.description:
Prince Hata`s past is revealed along with the history of Planet Okoku. Can Katsura and Hasegawa really get them on Earth`s side?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Men Must Live Not Long nor Thick, but Hard
Otoko wa Nagaku mo Futoku mo Naku Kataku Ikiro
Un homme ne doit pas avoir une vie longue ou grosse, mais ferme
男は長くも太くもなく硬く生きろ

REGULAR.description:
The Kabuki District is under siege, and the fearsome Dakini race arrive on the scene. How can the District and its residents cope with this onslaught?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ogre est faible face aux minus comme le Petit Poucet
Ogres Are Weak Against Tiny Heroes Like the Inch-High Samurai
Oni wa Issunboushi no You na Kotsubu ni Yowai
鬼は一寸法師のような小粒に弱い

REGULAR.description:
The Shinra finally make their move and look to capture the creator of the virus cannon with their underhand tactics. But right as things get desperate, the "boss" of the Kabuki District intervenes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bragging About Your Own Heroic Deeds Will Make People Hate You, So Make Others Do It for You
Mukashi no Buyuuden wa Jibun de Hanasu to Kirawareru node Tanin ni Hanasasero
Parler de ses vieux exploits entraîne le mépris, alors fais-les raconter
昔の武勇伝は自分で話すと嫌われるので他人に話させろ

REGULAR.description:
Under the leadership of the Kabuki District`s Four Devas, the residents are beginning to drive out the enemies inside the town. However, they still have to deal with Ougai, the leader of the Dakini force.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combien y a-t-il eu d`inflation avec le Jump ?
Jump and Power Creep Go Hand-in-Hand
Jump wa Infla Shite Nanbo
ジャンプはインフレしてなんぼ

REGULAR.description:
After successfully driving the Liberation Army out of the Kabuki District, its residents enjoy a well-earned break. However, they know that the peace won`t last for long.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heiwa to Hametsu wa Hyouriittai
Paix et ruine sont deux faces d`une même pièce
Peace and Destruction Are Two Sides of the Same Coin
平和と破滅は表裏一体

REGULAR.description:
Gengai has gone missing, and Ensho has brought out his trump card. How can the Odd Jobs, the Shinsengumi, Katsura, Sakamoto, and Nobunobu get out of this desperate situation?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bushido Is Found One Second Before Death
Bushidou to wa Byougo ni Shinu Koto to Mitsuketari
La voie du guerrier s`entrevoit une seconde avant la mort
武士道とは一秒後に死ぬ事と見つけたり

Opening 2a
Opening 2b
Opening 2c
Opening 2d
Opening 3
Ending 1
Ending 2
Ending 3

5384.name: put right what once went wrong

titles.title: Gintama. (2017)
Gintama Season 4 (2017)
银魂. 走光篇
gintama6
Gintama. Porori Hen
Gintama: Silver Soul
Gintama: Slip Arc
Гинтама. (2017)
銀魂. ポロリ編
